title: The Chronicles of Young Dmitry Medlov: Volumes 1-6
description: Dmitry Medlov is the world’s most dangerous, youngest and richest mob boss. It’s because of his business acumen and strategic alliances that he’s been able to avoid formal prosecution for years. However, such a thing doesn’t happen because of luck. One has to be smart. People smart. Street smart. Vor smart. As surrogate father to his sociopathic baby brother, Dmitry has been forced to carry a heavy burden protecting Ivan Medlov for years. As the head of his once small faction, The Medlov Crime Family, he’s been forced to carry an entire organization since its inception. But the real story is about the women that he loved, the international turf wars that he’s won and the way he handled his victories. Read over 1,000 sizzling pages of the gritty story behind the Russian Mafia's most brilliant, beautiful and deadly crime boss, the seven-foot tall, blonde Adonis, Dmitry Medlov and his rise up the ranks in the Vory v Zakone from the first interracial romance author to ever conceptualize organized crime as your hottest fantasies, national bestselling author Latrivia S. Nelson. This compilation consists of Volumes 1-6 of The Chronicles of Young Dmitry Medlov. If you have already purchased them, you will be purchasing the same product twice. Stay tuned as V7-12 are dropped over the next six months for new stories. Also visit www.latrivianelson.info for upcoming information.
author: Latrivia S. Nelson
